title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Six Drawers in Plan and Elevation, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Six Drawers in Plan and Elevation
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, below elevation view, center: SIDEBOARD / inch scale; across left edge and above center of elevation, numerical notations indicating dimensions; across top center of side view, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Elevation view: rectangular sideboard with backsplash and 4 straight tapering legs [2 shown]; 2 large horizontal drawers center front, flanked by 2 doors and topped by 4 small conforming drawers extending across entire front.
Side view: rectangular silhouette.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Six Drawers in Plan and Elevation, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-50
